title: IHC seeks ministryâ€™s comments regarding selection of Hajj assistance
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 03 (APP):The Islamabad High Court (IHC) on Friday sought comments from Ministry of Religious Affairs till January 20, in a case pertaining to the selections of Hajj assistants.
The court also served notices to the ministry on plea seeking a stay order against the process.
The petition said that the selection should be done through NTS.
